TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebRequestInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关当前 Web 请求的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the current Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 实例类包含通过获取信息， ， ，或类型。Instances of the class contain information that is obtained using the , , , or types. 你的应用程序需要访问受保护的信息，此类型提供的适当权限。Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access protected information provided by this type. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义的事件类的示例，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of creating a custom event class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现使用自定义事件类型。The following code example shows how to implement a custom event that uses the type. 也显示摘自使 ASP.NET 可以使用此自定义事件的配置文件。Also shown is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use this custom event. 确保你自定义事件是否会引发的在适当的时候，即，当将引发它将替换为等效的系统运行状况事件。Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation/CS/webrequestinformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation/VB/webrequestinformation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void FormatToString(class System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter formatter) cil managed

param.name: formatter
param.span: 包含用于设置 Web 运行状况事件信息格式的制表符和缩进设置的 。

span.span: The that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.

summary.span: 格式化 Web 请求信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为事件的信息，这很有用，如果必须记录事件数据，并将其更高版本提供给用户提供统一的格式。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 当提供程序调用之一时内部调用方法。It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置自定义信息的格式。The following code example shows how to format custom information. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation/CS/webrequestinformation.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation/VB/webrequestinformation.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Principal As IPrincipal
public: property System::Security::Principal::IPrincipal ^ Principal { System::Security::Principal::IPrincipal ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与 Web 请求关联的托管代码主体的实例。

span.span: Gets the instance of the managed-code principal associated with the Web request.

value.span: 与请求事件关联的 实例。

span.span: The instance that is associated with the request event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主体是指发出 Web 请求的经过身份验证实体。The principal refers to the authenticated entity that issued the Web request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 Web 请求与关联的主体。The following code example shows how to use the principal associated with the Web request.
